# Cloak of the Bat
## Overview
**Aura** moderate transmutation; **CL** 7th

**Slot** shoulders

**Price** 26,000 gp

**Weight** 1 lb.

**Description**

Fashioned of dark brown or black cloth, this cloak bestows a +5 competence bonus on [[Stealth (Skill)|Stealth]] checks. The wearer is also able to hang upside down from the ceiling like a bat.

By holding the edges of the garment, the wearer is able to *[[Fly (Spell)|fly]]* power for a like period of time.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Beast Shape III (Spell)|beast shape III]]**,* *[[Fly (Spell)|fly]]*

**Cost** 13,000 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 506
